item.title: Lisbon funicular worker among those killed in crash
item.description: Four employees of a non-profit organisation and a transport worker are among those who died.

item.title: Aid workers use donkeys to reach remote Sudan landslide site where hundreds feared dead
item.description: Aid workers deliver food and medical supplies to the village cut off by a massive landslide on Sunday.

item.title: South Koreans detained in ICE raid at Hyundai electric vehicle site in Georgia
item.description: The raid has sparked an angry response from South Korea which called it an unjust infringement of people's rights.

item.title: Trump set for first US Open final since 2015
item.description: President Donald Trump will attend the US Open for Sunday's men's singles final - his first visit to the event since 2015.

item.title: What we know about Lisbon's deadly funicular crash
item.description: At least 16 people died after a carriage on the city's famous Gl√≥ria hillside railway derailed.
